Text.Page:
We need you to link up with a scouting party behind the legion's lines.

Find Erbale and his small squad. Render what assistance you can, but don't give away their position. We lost a lot of scouts trying to infiltrate the legion's position.

Velnen sent you? It's so good to know he's backing our moves out here.

We could definitely use your help. Let's get to work!
